Container.Name: Nacho-Rclone-Native-GUI
Container.Overview:
This unRAID application is a Docker container running rclone's built-in GUI (https://rclone.org/gui/).
The default username and password is rclone/rclone. To change it, modify the `--rc-user` and `--rc-pass` values for `Post Arguments` in unRAID's container configuration.
Container.PostArgs: mount alist: "/data/rclone/alist/" --allow-other --log-level INFO --uid 99 --gid 100 --umask 000 --cache-dir "/data/rclone_cache/alist/" --dir-cache-time 720h --vfs-cache-mode full --vfs-cache-max-size 50G --vfs-cache-max-age 336h --vfs-read-ahead 4G --vfs-read-chunk-size 200M --vfs-read-chunk-size-limit 500M --attr-timeout 1m --drive-pacer-min-sleep 10ms --drive-pacer-burst 1000 --rc --rc-web-gui --rc-web-gui-update --rc-web-gui-force-update --rc-web-gui-no-open-browser --rc-addr :5572 --rc-user admin --rc-pass whb13907707741
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please consider Donating.
